column5: Well, what can one say. Doh! Man was it cold. I was tough enough to brave the elements though. We got there around 12:30 and the open hole on the ice was gleaming back at us. I didn't let it bother me, I figured it be best to acclimatize to the surroundings. So, I decided to just hang around with my swim shorts, boots and hat on. Only wimps wear coats in the winter!  Cupcake and myself along with everyones generous contributions, raised $1500.00  on the nose. A great start to our Chapter raising funds for the KTD signs! I wish to thank everyone for contributing. Just remember, (Tom, are you listening?) WE WON"T BE DOING THIS AGAIN!  Cheers, Ron...

LOL... good to see you're both eating well !  And man... what's with the hot tub??    That's cheatin ! lol  Great stuff guys! The things a guy will do for a dollar or two.....  Thought you would have at least swam a lap or two though.....
great job guys  would think the hot tub would have almost been as big a shock ( almost!)  tb

That's one of the funniest things I've seen in a long while, Ron.  Kudos to you and Chris for getting that particular job done.  I also noticed the support crew along side - did they have defibrillators handy?
That's just awful right there.
Now that made me laugh, that's hilarious.  Good for you for doing that.  Wish I had of remembered and come to see it in person.  Joey
You mean you are already out of that hot tub!!!   Great stuff....but never say never....it's like giving birth - you'll no doubt do it again.
Thats awesome bud.. good on ya!  the hot tub was a good idea...
my shorts are off to you guys. wow dedication man.
....I'm at a total loss for words here.
I saw it on CHEX-TV 06:00 o'clock news...BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR  I'd of had a heart attack, I think...
"One of life's most embarrassing moments"  Hey, we even made the CHEX news!  *edit* You saw it too eh Beans....
I dought they felt the cold.  Good job on ya all.
I thought bears hibernated  Looks like they loose their fur in the winter  Way to go guys,great innovative fund raiser

One of them fish on the backs must have been an old stocker from nogies creek as it missing a fin. its nice to see the musky guys as well as the muskies eat the oily ciscoes, eat your heart out Jenny Craig, Angelos Russian goodess would have warmed you both up and eveyone standing on shore as well. Congradulations and well done on the fundraising See you at the meeting on Tuesday and at Angelos on Saturday
My bad, of course cupcake is Jeff aka Team Empty Pockets, it's the surname thats Chris*.  Sry TEP, nice to see you again.

MAN BOOBS !!!!!  The things some guys will do for a little attention  geeee ???  Im just jokeing , what a great thing to do for a great cause , ya must have froze , great   job guys   BUTTTT ya could of kept the shirts on there were children present

Now that there is just down right FUNNY congratz guys I dont care what any one sais I will still fish with ya Ron and TEP.  That is for sure one way to make your mark for the new Chapter I bet the people in the area will not soon forget you guys.
That just goes to show you their devotion to boobs...  I love boobs so much, i grew a set of my own...

Yup we were discussing a new girl in our office the other day and a fellow worker complained that while pretty she didnt have enough boobs. I said thats all right Ive got enough boobs for the two of us.
